name: D-Class
title: D-Class
classbonus1: Convict: Use the Escape or Move action as a free action once per combat.
classbonus2: Limber: Spend 1 Luck to gain a bonus die on any Agility-based check.

name: DogClass
classbonus1: Watchdog: Use takedown as a free action once per combat

name: Field Agent
title: Field Agent
classbonus1: Enigma: Use Converse or Hide action as a free action once per combat.
classbonus2: Guide: Spend 1 Luck to gain a bonus die on any Charisma-based check.

name: MTF Agent
title: MTF Agent
classbonus1: Capable - You can use the Help or Ready action as a free action once per combat.
classbonus2: Lucid - You can spend 1 Luck to gain a bonus die on any Power-based check.

name: Researcher
title: Researcher
classbonus1: Analyst: Use the Assess or Inspect action as a free action once per combat.
classbonus2: Scholar: Spend 1 Luck to gain a bonus die on any Knowledge-based check.

name: Security Officer
title: Security Officer
classbonus1: Fortress: Use Brace or Resist action as a free action once per combat.
classbonus2: Powerful: Spend 1 Luck to gain a bonus die on any Strength-based check.

name: Soldier
title: Soldier
classbonus1: Convict; Use the Escape or Move action as a free action once per combat.
classbonus2: Limber; Spend 1 Luck to gain a bonus die on any Agility-based check.

name: Type green
classbonus1: Reality bender: One free attack action per turn
classbonus2: Reality denial. Spend 1 Luck point to nullify an incoming attack
